地: {"pinyin": "dì, de", "meaning": ["dì morpheme:earth, soil", "de structural particle: link the modifier and the verb"], "usage": ["The basic structure is: adjective + 地 de + verb", "The situations of not using 地 to link the modifier and the verb are: a.if the adjective made of only one character, there is no need to have 地 to link it and the verb the adjective intends to modify; 2.if the adjective and  verb are both two-character words, the usage of 地 is optional;3. if the adjective is in its reduplication form AA or AABB, it is not a necessity to use 地"], "example": ["前面一辆汽车飞快(地)向前开去。", "离上课时间还有一个小时，小明不着急，慢慢(地)向学校走去。", "鱼缸(ɡāng)里的几条小鱼开心地游来游去。"]}

谁: {"pinyin": "shuí,shéi", "meaning": ["pron. who,whom", "pron.someone, anyone"], "usage": ["谁 has two different pronunciations and both are acceptable in China. ", "When 谁 is used as who or whom, it must be in a question. 少: {"pinyin": "shǎo,shào", "meaning": ["adj.shǎo few,little,less", "adj.shào young,younger ", "adv.shǎo rarely", "v.shǎo lack of, be short of, lose"], "usage": ["Sometimes people can use 少 to infer that his/her money is lost or stolen. 想: {"pinyin": "xiǎng", "meaning": ["v. think,ponder,suppose"], "usage": ["想 consists of two parts: the upper part is 相 pronouncing as \"xiāng\" and the lower 心 representing heart.", "想 is often used in the \"verb 一 verb\", \"verb 一下/一会儿\" forms, or in the directional complement like 想起来/出来., or what exactly the thinker thinks ", "In Chinese, when we talk about our own opinion , we do not often say \"我想\" and just directly say what we think."], "example": ["你说小杨呀，我要想一下他现在在哪里。", "安明想了一会儿，还是决定今天晚饭不吃海鲜了。", "对了，我想起来了，他们一家搬到别的地方去了。", "大家商量了一个下午，终于想出来一个好的解决方案。", "请问，您想吃点什么？", "我想明天和朋友一起去逛街。"]}

从: {"pinyin": "cóng", "meaning": ["prep.from", "prep.through", "adj.not primary"], "usage": ["When it expresses 'not primary', it is often used in words like 从兄,从妹 who are brothers and sisters from relatives , not from the same parents.", "从 can express the starting point of a place or a time point."], "example": ["昨天晚上从七点半到十一点，我一直在写家庭作业。", "从北京到上海坐飞机更快，不过坐火车更便宜。", "那个戴着蓝色球帽的小男孩是我的从弟。"]}

菜: {"pinyin": "cài", "meaning": ["n.a general term for any dish on the table during a meal", "n.a general term for groceries needed to prepare dishes for meals "], "usage": ["The original meaning of 菜 is the vegetable, but now it can refer to any food ( e.g.vegetable or meals or sea fishes). The often-seen measure words for '菜' are 道 and 盘.", "菜鸟 (literally means 'vegetable bird' is used to describe people who are not good at something or who is just a new novice in a career, or '菜' can also describe someone who is disadvantage at some aspect. 出: {"pinyin": "chū", "meaning": ["v. go out", "v.leave", "v.(something bad like issue,problem,error and accident) occur"], "usage": ["When 出 expresses the meaning of 'out', there are some commonly used expressions: 出门(leave from a house),出城/村 (leave the city/ the village),出国(leave your county),出院(leavel the hospital when you recover), 出狱(leave the jail when the sentence is over).You can use these words with confidence, but do not overuse 出 as the meaning of 'leave'", "出 can be used after another verb as a complement. ", "差(chà)不多 indicates the approximation of reaching a certain point."], "example": ["陈晓霞差一点就能考上大学了。", "她这次英语考试 差一点儿就满分了。", "这两个西瓜的大小差不多。", "班里的同学都差不多来了。", "美国有些地方跟中国有十二个小时的时差。", "因为时差，小明到现在还在白天想睡觉。", "现在时间是差十五分八点。", "我还差五块钱才能买那个面包，你能借我五块吗?", "小明差五厘米才一米七。"]}

百: {"pinyin": "bǎi", "meaning": ["num.hundred", "adj.all kinds of, numerous"], "usage": ["It is easy to express 100 to 999 by just placing 百 after the hundredth position. For example, 998 should be pronounced as 九百九十八."], "example": ["感谢您百忙之中来参加我们的庆典！", "205 应该读成 \"二百零五\"。"]}

(of eating)full", "adv. fully"], "usage": ["The antonym is 饿 è.", "The adverb usage of 饱 is often collocated with something very figurative or formal: 饱含（contain sth. very full), 饱经风霜(idiom, endure all the hardships of exposure), 饱览(have a full view of sth. e.g. scene)"], "example": ["我再也吃不下了，吃得太饱了。", "他们跋山涉水(bá shān shè shuǐ: idiom clime up the mountains and wade through rivers)，饱尝艰辛(jiān xīn:hardships)，终于达到了目的地了。"]}
包: {"pinyin": "bāo", "meaning": ["v. wrap", "v. surround", "v. undertake the full responsibility ", "n. a general term for any kind of bag", "n. surname"], "usage": ["包 + 起来:= 包 frequently used", "包饺子: make dumplings", "书包: literally meaning book bag -> school bag", "The measure word is either 个 or 只."], "example": ["我们先要把东西包起来，包好了才能寄出去。", "浓雾(nóng wù)包住了我们，前方什么都看不清楚。", "这些工作我包了，你们不用担心。", "这个包太贵了，我买不起。"]}
抱: {"pinyin": "bào", "meaning": ["v.hug, embrace", "v. hold sth. in an embrace"], "usage": ["拥抱(yōng bào):n. hug, embrace"], "example": ["她紧紧抱着儿子，害怕他受到伤害(shāng hài )。", "她胜利归来，大家给了她一个大大的拥抱。", "包裹太多了，她只好抱着回家。"]}
白: {"pinyin": "bái", "meaning": ["adj.white", "adj.tasteless", "adv. vainly", "n. surname"], "usage": ["白 also has other meanings like bright, clear,blank and etcc., but in modern Chinese, it needs other Chinese characters to make a new word expressing these meanings."], "example": ["我小时候有个好朋友叫白晓琴。", "为了身体健康，我们最好喝白开水。", "你为什么不吃菜？光吃白饭。", "我们白去了那家商场几次，都没买到那件大衣。", "小珍认真地学习了两个月还是没及格，白费时间和精力了。"]}
不: {"pinyin": "bù", "meaning": ["adv. not, a word usually placed before a verb or an adjective to add the negative meaning for it, e.g. 不吃，不要,不漂亮", "adv. not, placed before a noun to show the opposite meaning of the noun e.g. 不道德(bú dào de):unethnical"], "usage": ["The sandhi of '不': it should be pronounced as the rising tone if followed by a hanzi with fallling tone, and as the neutral tone if between two same verbs (e.g. 想一想，吃一吃),or in the potential complement (e.g.吃不完,来不了)"], "example": ["我晚饭不喜欢吃饭，喜欢吃面条。", "妈妈不准我们晚上出门玩。", "今天的菜太好吃了，我都吃不动了。"]}
把: {"pinyin": "bǎ", "meaning": ["measure word: used before objects with handles or things to take hold of  like 椅子,雨伞", "prep. constitute an adverbial with the object after it , treating the specific person or thing in a way"], "usage": ["sb.+把 + sth. + verb + 在/到 + somewhere: sb.verb sth. onto/into some certain place", "sb.1 + 把 + sth. + verb + 给 + sb.2: sb.1 gives sth.(in a specific way) to sb.2.", "sb. + 把 + sth.1 + verb + 成(chéng) + sth.2: sb. changes/converts sth.1 into sth.2.", "sb.1 + 把 + sth./sb.2 + verb + result complement: sb.1 performs an action(verb) to sth./sb.2 so a result comes out.", "sb.1 + 把 + sth./sb.2 + verb + directional complement: sb.1  performs an action on  sth./sb.2 to cause the target to move in a specific way", "sb1. + 把 + sth./sb.2 + verb + status complement: sb1. performs an action on sb2./sth. to make the target stay at a status."], "example": ["这把椅子不是你的，那把雨伞也不是你的。", "小明把英汉词典放到桌子上了。", "小明把礼物寄给了妈妈。", "小明把这本英文书翻译成了中文的。", "小明把今天的作业写完了。", "小明把家里的小狗带去了学校。", "小明把房间打扫得干干净净的。"]}

回: {"pinyin": "huí", "meaning": ["v.turn around", "v.return,go back", "v. answer to (someone's words,message),reply", "measure word: time", "n.an abbreviation for 回族(huí zú), a Chinese ethnic minority"], "usage": ["We usually do not say \"去家\",and always say \"回家\".", "回 can be used with directional verbs e.g.来,去. to form new words i.e. 回来,回去. 换: {"pinyin": "huàn", "meaning": ["v.exchange", "v.change"], "usage": ["把...换成...: exchange ... for ..."], "example": ["你有多余的笔，我有多余的橡皮擦，要不我们换一下吧，我用我的橡皮擦换你的笔。", "我想把所有的美元换成人民币。", "你在下一个站换乘三号线，再坐五个站就到动物园了。"]}

无: {"pinyin": "wú", "meaning": ["v. not have, there is not", "n. nothing,nought"], "usage": ["目中无人(mù zhōng wú rén):treat others with contempt,put on airs and look down on other people", "身无分文(shēn wú fēn wén): carry no money with oneself, not have a single penny left", "无人机:pilotless aircraft"], "example": ["这个人特别自以为是(zì yǐ wéi shì:self-conceited)，目中无人。", "他完完全全破产了，现在已经是身无分文了。", "现在教室已经空无一人了，快叫老李来锁门吧。"]}
网: {"pinyin": "wǎng", "meaning": ["n.net e.g.渔网(yǔ wǎng)", "n.web", "n.(interpersonal) networks e.g.关系网(guān xì wǎng)", "n. internet e.g. 上网(shàng wǎng)", "v. catch (e.g. fishes, crabs) with a net"], "usage": ["网 originally refers to the fish net (渔网). It extends to represent things resembling the shape of a net  in the nature. e.g. 蜘蛛网(zhī zhū wǎng): spider web.In modern times, 网 is often used when people talk about the internet(因特网 yīn tè wǎng)."], "example": ["现在的人很喜欢上网购物。", "这只可怜的小白兔被猎人的陷阱网住了。", "他是做推销的，人际网很广。", "网上最近有很多关于她的新闻。"]}
往: {"pinyin": "wǎng", "meaning": ["v. go e.g. 来往", "morpheme ->v. go e.g. 往来", "prep. towards,toward"], "usage": ["往来 n.:contact, dealings, intercourse", "来往 v.: go and come"], "example": ["自从搬家之后，我们和以前的邻居就没有什么往来了。", "他们往天空望了望，看见一架飞机飞过。", "去最近的银行，就顺着这条路往东去就能看到了。"]}
为: {"pinyin": "wèi,wéi", "meaning": ["prep. wèi for ", "prep. 作为 zuò  wéi as", "n. wéi achievement e.g. 作为(zuò  wéi)", "v.wéi  become,turn into", "v.wéi do act"], "usage": ["为 wéi as a verb is not commonly seen in modern Chinese except in some idioms like 人满为患(rén man3 wéi huàn),为非作歹(wéi feī zuò  dǎi) ", "In modern Chinese,为wéi usually combines with another Hanzi to make a word, such as 行为(xíng wéi behaviour),作为(zuò  wéi: action, conduct, deed, regard as).", "As a preposition, its frequently usage is 为了(wèi le), which shows an intention and a goal."], "example": ["为了明天不迟到，今天一定要早点儿睡。", "他为了不让妈妈生气，吃完饭就开始写作业。", "作为一名警察，这是我该做的。", "她乐于助人的行为，获得了大家一致的称赞。"]}

爱: {"pinyin": "ài", "meaning": ["n.love", "vt.to love, to be fond of "], "usage": ["Even though 爱 can refer to any kind of love, '我爱你' is a very serious expression in Chinese.So try not to use it too often.", "爱 can also show the speaker's strong fondness for doing sth. or sth."], "example": ["我姐姐很爱化妆。", "爱是世界上最伟大的情感。", "很多外国人爱吃宫保鸡丁，其实中国有很多菜，不止宫保鸡丁。"]}
个: {"pinyin": "ɡè", "meaning": ["It is one of the most commonly-used measure word in Chinese language.It can refer to many things like 手机,杯子，碗,人,月,小时."], "usage": false, "example": ["桌子上有三个碗。", "我需要两个小时完成这个项目。", "教室里有三个人，猜猜看他们都是谁？"]}

狗: {"pinyin": "gǒu", "meaning": ["n.dog", "adj.damned, cursed"], "usage": ["Even though dogs are also regarded as a royal animal in Chinese culture, it is offensive to describe someone as a dog or anything related to dogs.", "The meaure words for it are 只 zhī and 条 tiáo."], "example": ["我有一只很可爱的小狗，叫豆豆。", "我家里养了两条狗。", "你真是个狗东西。"]}

跟: {"pinyin": "gēn", "meaning": ["v. follow", "prep. with", "prep. to "], "usage": ["跟 as a verb cannot be used alone, as there is always a directional complement after it , or other elements like 着,过. ", "跟 as a preposition is only used before a human being. When the negative word 不 is placed before it, it shows the speaker's will. And if 不 is before the second verb in the sentence ,it shows the objective situation. ", "跟...有/没关系: have something/nothing to do with sth.", "跟...一样/不一样: be the same as .../ not be the same as..."], "example": ["前面的人走得太快了，后面的人跟不上了。", "我跟着她一直走出书店。", "我不跟你们去参加星期六的聚会了，太累了。", "我跟这个人完全不认识。", "这次车祸(chē huò)跟这辆黄色的车没关系，有关系的是另一辆白色的汽车。", "小玲跟她弟弟不一样，她比较喜欢出门玩， 他喜欢呆在家里阅读(yuè dú)。", "这两件T恤都一样的，你不用再挑(tiāo)了，哪一件都差不多。"]}

光: {"pinyin": "guāng", "meaning": ["n. light, brightness", "morpheme->adj. smooth, glossy", "adj. nothing", "adv. only, merely"], "usage": ["The measure word is 道 dào for 光 as 'light'.", "光 as adjective 'nothing' is often used after a verb as a result complement, e.g. 用光:use until nothing is left"], "example": ["在黑夜里，空中出现一道光。", "她吃光了所有的食物，不知道能不能走出沙漠(shā mò: dessert)。", "牛年已经喝光了，记得明天去超市买一箱回来。", "爸爸留给她的遗产(yí chǎn: heritage)不算房产，光是现金就有几百万。"]}

各: {"pinyin": "ɡè", "meaning": ["pron. every, each", "adv. each"], "usage": ["各 + (measure word) + noun", "There may or may not be a measure word after 各,sometimes a noun indicating a group can be directly placed after 各."], "example": ["因为不知道爷爷喜欢吃什么水果，小明把商店里有的水果各买了一斤。", "各个国家都有他们自己的风俗习惯。", "我们班的同学来自于各个省(shěng: province)。"]}
